subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: With the Heisman Trophy winner Sam Bradford helplessly watching on the sideline, his right arm in a sling, No. 20 Brigham Young upset No. 3 Oklahoma, 14-13.
snippet: With the Heisman Trophy winner Sam Bradford helplessly watching on the sideline, his right arm in a sling, No. 20 Brigham Young upset No. 3 Oklahoma, 14-13.
